ground_equipment.name: Universal Kit Module - Ataxian Mood Shifter

text.1:
This Kid Module makes use of a strange artifact that temporarily transformed the user into a brutal scorpion, given the right emotional preconditions. For a moderate duration, all abilities are replaced with devastating melee and ranged biological attacks. Passive abilities are retained during the transformation. The effects appear to have no lasting consequences though this has not been studies at length. Usage without proper emotional calibration is not recommended. The Mk level of the Kit Module improves the boost to base stats.
: (40 max)
: Targets Self
: 2 sec activate
: 50 sec recharge

: * Tail Whip: Deal x Physica Damage to Foes in a narrow cone
: * Sting: Deal x Physica Damage to a group of Foes around the Target Foe, x Toxic Damage per sec for 10 sec, and Knock them towards you
